Frequently Asked Questions

[vc_column_text]Below you’ll find answers to some of the most frequently asked questions at Tectxon. We are constantly adding most asked question to this page so if you have a question and don’t see your answer, don’t hesitate to email us at info@example.com[/vc_column_text][vc_tta_accordion color=”grey” gap=”20″ active_section=”1″][vc_tta_section title=”Are you ISO certified?” tab_id=”1533396882102-15df988c-ee5b”][vc_column_text]Yes, we are ISO 9001 certified industry. Click here to view our certificate.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Which parts do you most commonly machine for the automotive industry?” tab_id=”1533396882141-f4e83ff9-08ff”][vc_column_text]We mainly supply auto engine and fuel transmission parts.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Which material types can you work with?” tab_id=”1533397427840-523d2361-d328″][vc_column_text]We will stamp most metals and alloys specified by the clients. We most often process aluminiuam products including auto parts, galvanized, stainless steel, high strength pipes, low alloy, steel, and most alloys. We also stamp aluminum (all alloys) and aluminum T1/T2, plus brass and copper.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Which types of works does Tectxon manufacture ?” tab_id=”1533397591990-9dd742b0-768c”][vc_column_text]

  • Agricultural
  • Auto Parts
  • Construction
  • Solar energry
  • Industrial Equipment
  • Material Handling
  • Mining Equipment
  • Oil & Gas Equipment
  • Power Generation

[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Can steel be recycled?” tab_id=”1533397820292-167ebe6e-b8fd”][vc_column_text]Yes – steel is infinitely recyclable and can be re-used again and again in the steel making process. About 18% of our steel is made from recycled steel, and we are the largest recycler of scrap steel in usa.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”How does Tectxon Industries control its manufacturing process?” tab_id=”1533397978258-198e3019-cc28″][vc_column_text]There are many variations of passages of Lorem Ipsum available, but the majority have suffered alteration in some form, by injected humour, or randomised words which don’t look even slightly believable. If you are going to use a passage of Lorem Ipsum, you need to be sure there isn’t anything embarrassing hidden in the middle of text.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Where can I request my order quotation ?” tab_id=”1533398082683-9877f66e-8883″][vc_column_text]You can email it directly to sales@example.com. Our sales department team send you an order acknowledgement to let you know that we have everything we need to begin the project.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][/vc_tta_accordion][/vc_column][/vc_row]
